doc.title: Oh, Watson!
doc.plot: 'Oh, Watson' is a biography on the extremely talented dancer, teacher, and choreographer, Sam Watson, who teaches Modern and Jazz Dance at the University of Arizona in Tucson. Using techniques that combine the richest traditions of good theater, vaudeville and dance genres, Sam mesmerizes and entertains both dancers and non dancers with his unique style of choreography. His work is very well known and respected both here in the United States and throughout the world. This documentary examines the life of the Master and focuses on his work with his University of Arizona students and other professional dancers and dance companies, including Gus Giordano Jazz Dance Chicago and Moving People Dance Santa Fe.
